summary: Cavalrymen disguised as civilians must drive a wagon train loaded with army rifles through dangerous Apache territory to Fort Collins.
cast: Philip Carey|Audrey Totter|Douglas Kennedy|Jeff Donnell|Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams|Charlita|Ross Elliott|Ralph Dumke|Mel Welles|Chris Alcaide|Steven Ritch|John Pickard|James Flavin|Bill Hale|Post Park|Frank Sully|Robert B. Williams
title: Massacre Canyon
